title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: Upon exporting a directory and placing the exported jar in the same directory, an out of sync message is shown when the exported jar file is overwritten for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to prevent the out of sync message.
SR: 1. Open the project directory.2. Export the directory as a jar file.3. Save the exported jar file in the same project directory.4. Overwrite the exported jar file.5. Observe and note the out of sync message.
